subject: Soccer
Olympic Games (2008)
Athletics and Sports
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Pia Sundhage, who coached in the United States in the Women’s United Soccer Association, has been named coach of the women’s national team through the 2008 Beijing Olympics.
snippet: Pia Sundhage, who coached in the United States in the Women’s United Soccer Association, has been named coach of the women’s national team through the 2008 Beijing Olympics.
